title: Michelangelo (Caprese 1475 - Rome 1564)
creator_credit: Ugo De Lucia, Giovanni Gronchi and Romor Film
brief_description: Shows the course of development of Michelangelo both as an artist and as a man. Beginning with the Madonna della Scala, done when the artist was fifteen years old, and ending with the Pieta Rondanini, we are visually led by commentator Carlo Ragghianti showing the course of development of Michelangelo Buonarotti both as an artist and as a man.
creator_credit_for_label: Ugo De Lucia, Giovanni Gronchi and Romor Film
